_sText:
This is a playable port of cs_siege from 1.6.  I decompiled the original map then went through and replaced the old textures with CS:S textures.  I also redid all of the lighting entities as they did not decompile properly. 

Additionally:
-Doors Removed
-T base reduced in size
-Two hostage rescue zones (bridge and tunnel end)
-Moved hostages into garage for balance
-Map seems to lag in some spots (tweet me @vybeypantelonez if you know how to fix that), but is fully playable.
-Some spots simplified, still func_detail-ing the map though
-Still a WIP but looks decent

Will be releasing the .vmf file tomorrow but I'm too tired to do it now.
